title: Textile, "Golden Pheasant", ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: woodblock-printed using 2 greens, 2 turquoises, 3 browns gray, black and maroon on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 153 x 151 cm (60 1/4 x 59 7/16 in.)
Repeat (half-drop) H: 156.2 cm (5 ft. 1 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Pheasants among the rocks in multi-color on maroon background.
